sn54.20:1.2: Kathaṃ bhāvito ca, bhikkhave, ānāpānassatisamādhi kathaṃ bahulīkato saṃyojanappahānāya saṃvattati …
sn54.20:1.6: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā …pe…
sn54.20:1.7: paṭinissaggānupassī assasissāmīti sikkhati, paṭinissaggānupassī passasissāmīti sikkhati.
sn54.20:1.8: Evaṃ bhāvito kho, bhikkhave, ānāpānassatisamādhi evaṃ bahulīkato saṃyojanappahānāya saṃvattati …pe…
